mapper.insert: insert into street_info_table (streetid, streetname, bl_areaid, parse) values (#{streetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{streetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blAreaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parse,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into street_info_table
streetid,
streetname,
bl_areaid,
parse,
#{streetid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{streetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{blAreaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update street_info_table
streetname = #{streetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bl_areaid = #{blAreaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parse = #{parse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where streetid = #{streetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.streetid as id, a.streetname as name, a.bl_areaid as blId, a.parse as parse,DATE_FORMAT( p.out_time, '%Y%m%d' ) as day,COUNT( 1 ) as sum from street_info_table a,people_out_info_table p where a.bl_areaid = #{bl_areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (p.out_time >= date_sub(now(), interval 1 DAY )) and (p.sub_provice = a.streetid or sub_area = a.streetid or sub_street = a.streetid or sub_com = a.streetid or sensorid = a.streetid) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( p.out_time, '%Y%m%d' )
